headline: Empowering healthcare through Digital Marketing
subheadline: We are a team of digital marketing experts who help healthcare providers to grow their business online.

about.headline: About Sondr
about.p: We are a team of digital marketing experts who help healthcare providers to grow their business online. With over 20+ years of experience in Healthcare and Marketing we bring the tools and experience to make your business successful.

serviceSection.headline: Services
serviceSection.p: We offer a wide range of services to help you grow your business online. We can help you with your website, social media, SEO, and more.
